mean_cn: n. 丛林
sentence: The elephants take us deeper into the jungle.
sentence_tra: 大象们带我们深入丛林。

mean_cn: n. 平原, 旷野;  大平原;  adj. 平坦的;  明白的;  坦率的;  朴素的;
sentence: I like plain T-shirts as they are simple and cheap.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢这种普通的T恤，因为他们即便宜又简约。

mean_cn: n. 熊，看跌的人v. 容忍，带有，生育，产生
sentence: I'm scared of the bear--don't let it get near me!
sentence_tra: 我怕熊，别让它靠近我！

mean_cn: v. 确认，证实，批准
sentence: I'll confirm that I want to buy this shirt online.
sentence_tra: 我会确认我想在网上买这件衬衫。

mean_cn: v. 衰退，下降；拒绝n. 衰退，下降
sentence: Ordinary people's incomes have been declining every year in many Western countries.
sentence_tra: 在很多西方国家，普通人的收入每年都在下降。

mean_cn: n.哺乳动物
sentence: Dogs are man's favorite mammal.
sentence_tra: 狗是最受人类喜爱的哺乳动物。

mean_cn: n.熄灭，灭绝，消失
sentence: After the extinction of the dinosaurs, mammals came to rule the Earth.
sentence_tra: 恐龙灭绝后，哺乳动物开始统治地球。

mean_cn: n. 种类; 人类;  adj. 物种上的;
sentence: There are tens of thousands of different species of birds.
sentence_tra: （全球）有成千上万种各不相同的鸟。

mean_cn: n.无尾猿，类人猿；模仿者；粗野的大汉
sentence: The orangutan is a highly intelligent, and endangered, ape.
sentence_tra: 类人猿是一种濒临灭绝的高智商猿。

mean_cn: v. 提升，提前n. 前进，增长，接近
sentence: I'd like to advance as high up in this company as possible.
sentence_tra: 我想在这座公司里尽可能地爬高。

mean_cn: n. 存在;  持续存在;  发生;  生存;  生活方式;  存在物;
sentence: Do you believe in the existence of dragons?
sentence_tra: 你相信龙的存在吗？

mean_cn: 北极区
sentence: The Arctic climate is cold even for a bear.
sentence_tra: 熊也会觉得北极地区的气候很冷。

mean_cn: vi. 走私, 非法偷运;  vt. 走私, 非法偷运;
sentence: He smuggled the phones by concealing them underneath his coat.
sentence_tra: 他走私手机的方式是把它们藏在外套下面。

mean_cn: adj. 凶猛的;  猛烈的;  狂热的;
sentence: Male animals can be fierce when they fight over females.
sentence_tra: 当雄性动物为了雌性动物而打架时，它们会变得异常凶猛！

mean_cn: n. 家畜, 牲畜;
sentence: The livestock provide farmers with meat, milk and wool.
sentence_tra: 家畜为农夫提供肉、奶和羊毛。

mean_cn: n.(地球的)半球；大脑半球
sentence: A hemisphere is half of a sphere, or ball.
sentence_tra: 半球就是半个球体，或球形。

sentence: Make sure to pack all your clothing for the trip!
sentence_tra: 确保打包好所有你这次旅行需要的衣服。

mean_cn: n.自然环境，栖息地
sentence: A polar bear's habitat is Northern ice and snow.
sentence_tra: 北极熊的栖息地在冰天雪地的北极。

mean_cn: adv. 结果, 因此, 所以;
sentence: She's exercising more, and consequently she's losing weight.
sentence_tra: 她做了更多的运动，因此她体重减轻了。

mean_cn: n.(速度上的)比赛；人种；种族　v.全速进行；(使)比速度；竞赛
sentence: It was fun participating in the race.
sentence_tra: 参加赛车真的很好玩。

mean_cn: v.开始，发动n.新加入组织的人
sentence: The man initiates the race by firing a gun.
sentence_tra: 这个人鸣枪发起竞赛。

mean_cn: vi. 威胁, 恐吓;  vt. 威胁, 恐吓;  预示…的恶兆;
sentence: He threatened me and asked to stay back after school.
sentence_tra: 他威胁我，让我放学后别走。

mean_cn: v. 相像; 相似; 类似;
sentence: My dog resembles a brown mop.
sentence_tra: 我的狗像一根棕色的拖把。

mean_cn: n.目的，目标adj.客观的，真实的，宾语的
sentence: The objective behind the business is very clear.
sentence_tra: 这单生意的目标是很明确的。

mean_cn: 可用作；可当……使
sentence: Although chopsticks are used to eat, they can also serve as interesting hair decorations.
sentence_tra: 尽管筷子是用来吃饭的，他们也可用作好玩的头发装饰物。

mean_cn: n.证据，证明，校样v.校验
sentence: We have proof that you're sick.
sentence_tra: 我们有证据表明你生病了。

mean_cn: n.幼兽，年轻无经验的人
sentence: The two bears got married and eventually had a young cub together.
sentence_tra: 那两只熊结了婚，后来有了一只小熊崽。

mean_cn: adv.真正地；确实
sentence: My coworkers told me that I did, indeed, do a good job.
sentence_tra: 我的同事告诉我真的干得不错！

mean_cn: adj.适合的；能适应的；可修改的
sentence: Humans are so adaptable that they can live even in the coldest places.
sentence_tra: 人类的适应能力很强，因此他们甚至能够居住在最冷的地方。

mean_cn: adj.确定的；积极的；实际的；阳性的n.正面；正数
sentence: Stay positive; keep your mind on the good things.
sentence_tra: 保持乐观：把注意力放在好的事情上。

mean_cn: n.抑郁，沮丧；不景气，萧条(期)；洼地，凹陷
sentence: After the divorce she sank into a deep depression; she barely ate or slept.
sentence_tra: 离婚后她沉浸在极度的抑郁中，几乎不吃不睡。

mean_cn: adj. 着迷的; 被深深吸引的; v. 使着迷; 使陶醉（fascinate的过去分词）
sentence: He is fascinated with this game.

mean_cn: n.视力，望见，视域
sentence: My dog's sight is better with these binoculars.
sentence_tra: 用了望远镜，我的狗视力更好了。

mean_cn: adj. 严重的；严厉的；严酷的；剧烈的
sentence: The thunderstorms are very severe; I've seen lightning countless times tonight.
sentence_tra: 暴风雨很猛烈，我今晚都看了无数次闪电了。

mean_cn: n.全体船员，乘务员，职员，同事，工友
sentence: The crew members lined up in the morning before beginning work.
sentence_tra: 全体船员每天早上在开始工作前先列队。

mean_cn: n.目击者，见证人；证据，证言v.目击，注意到；为…作证
sentence: He was the only witness to the murder; he can tell us what really happened.
sentence_tra: 他是这场谋杀案的唯一目击者，他能告诉我们发生了什么。

mean_cn: n.海军
sentence: The navy was advancing for battle in the morning.
The ship dropped the anchor down for the night.
sentence_tra: 船抛下锚过夜。

mean_cn: adj.绝对的，无条件的
sentence: Mothers have unconditional love for their children.
sentence_tra: 妈妈对孩子的爱是无条件的。

mean_cn: v.拖；拉
sentence: My car broke down so my friend had to tow me home.
sentence_tra: 我的车抛锚了，所以我的朋友只能把我（的车）拖回家。

mean_cn: v.测定，找出...的位置，使...坐落于
sentence: The most important cities are located here, here and here.
sentence_tra: 几个最重要的城市位于这里，这里，还有这里。

mean_cn: adj. 复杂的，难解的
sentence: Geometry is a very complicated subject--it makes my head hurt.
sentence_tra: 几何是一门非常复杂的学科，让我很头疼。

mean_cn: adj.易曲的，柔软的，灵活的
sentence: She's so flexible because she's practiced yoga for so long.
sentence_tra: 练了很久的瑜伽，让她的身体很柔软。

mean_cn: 依靠；粘在...上
sentence: He had to cling to the wall so he would not fall off.
sentence_tra: 他不得不紧紧依附在墙上以免落下。

mean_cn: n.掠夺者，食肉动物
sentence: The bear is the main predator of the fish.
sentence_tra: 熊是鱼类的主要捕食者。

mean_cn: adj.不可相信的；惊人的，不可思议的
sentence: What an incredible martial arts fight!
sentence_tra: 多么不可思议的一场武术格斗啊！

mean_cn: n. 极端；末端adj. 极端的；尽头的
sentence: The roller coaster has some pretty extreme turns; it might make you sick.
sentence_tra: 过山车有一些非常极端的转弯，这可能会让你觉得不舒服。

sentence: Look, the eggs are hatching!
sentence_tra: 看啊，小鸡出壳呢！

mean_cn: adv. 非常，极其；极端地
sentence: The dog on the right is extremely small.
sentence_tra: 右边的这只狗真小。

mean_cn: n. 超自然物, 神奇人物, 不可思议的事;  adj. 超自然的;
sentence: I want to go to Hogwarts, like Harry Potter, to get supernatural powers.
sentence_tra: 我想去霍格华兹魔法学校，像哈利・波特那样，学会超自然能力。

mean_cn: v.(用实例、实验)论证，演示，示威
sentence: This experiment demonstrates the chemical principle we were discussing.
sentence_tra: 这个实验论证了我们讨论的化学原理。

mean_cn: n.狂热者，热衷者
sentence: He's a hot air balloon enthusiast.
sentence_tra: 他是热气球狂热爱好者。

mean_cn: n. 被捕的动物, 捕获物;  vi. 捕食;      受...控制;    受害;    使耿耿于怀
sentence: The dog brings his prey back to eat.
sentence_tra: 那只狗把猎物带回来吃了。

mean_cn: n. 海豚;
sentence: That dolphin family deem the feeder as one of them.
sentence_tra: 这个海豚家族把饲养员看做成他们的一份子。

mean_cn: n.浮游生物
sentence: Whales grow very large although the food they eat is very tiny plankton.
sentence_tra: 尽管鲸吃的食物是非常微小的浮游生物，但是他们能长得非常大。

mean_cn: vi. 偿还; 补偿; 报答;  vt. 偿还(钱款或债务); 报答; 补偿;
sentence: If you do not repay the loan, your credit card will be taken away.
sentence_tra: 如果你不归还贷款，你的信用卡将会被收回。

mean_cn: n. 处罚;  罚球;adj. 处罚的;
sentence: You used your hands! The other side can take a penalty kick!
sentence_tra: 你用手了，对方可以罚一个点球。

sentence: The elephants are approaching us.
sentence_tra: 一群大象正在靠近我们。

mean_cn: v.帮助；待人如友
sentence: I'm glad he befriended me when I was so sad.
sentence_tra: 我很高兴他在我悲伤时帮助了我。

mean_cn: adv. 财政上；金融上
sentence: I'm working out which is the financially best choice.
sentence_tra: 我正在研究最经济的选择是哪个。

mean_cn: vt. 供应, 提供;  (用家具等)布置(房间、公寓等);
sentence: We furnished our room with very expensive furniture.
sentence_tra: 我们用非常昂贵的家具来装饰我们的房间。

mean_cn: adj.糟糕的；恶劣的；可怜的，身心疲惫的
sentence: I think homeless people live a very wretched life.
sentence_tra: 我认为无家可归的人生活得很可怜。

mean_cn: v.挑选；拾；摘，采摘n. 鹤嘴锄
sentence: You can pick one for dessert.
sentence_tra: 你可以选一个作甜点。

mean_cn: n.地区，领土；（美国）准州；（加拿大）地方；（澳大利亚）区
sentence: China's territory includes forests, plains and deserts.
sentence_tra: 中国的领土包括森林、平原和沙漠。

mean_cn: v.获得，增加n.获得，增加
sentence: He only cared about personal gain, and never helped out his friends.
sentence_tra: 他只关心自己的利益，从不帮助他的朋友。

mean_cn: adj.自传的；自传作家的
sentence: "The life of Han Shan" is an autobiographical account of Han Shan's life, written by himself.
sentence_tra: 《憨山大师缘》是憨山的生平自传，由他自己撰写。

mean_cn: n.运货马车，运货车；敞蓬车厢
sentence: He took his sister for a ride down the street in his little wagon.
sentence_tra: 他用他的小货车顺道带了他姐姐一路。

mean_cn: n.食品杂货店
sentence: Grocery stores greatly solve our daily purpose.
sentence_tra: 杂货店解决了我们的日常需求。

mean_cn: n. 职业;  才能;  天职, 使命;
sentence: Doctor is the vocation which requires great responsibility.
sentence_tra: 医生这种职业需要强大的责任感。

mean_cn: n.痛苦，悲惨，不幸
sentence: Her misery is due to her mother's death.
sentence_tra: 她的痛苦都来自于母亲的过世。

mean_cn: n.铁锨，铲v.铲起
sentence: That shovel creeps me out; they use it to dig graves.
sentence_tra: 那个铁铲太可怕了因为他们用它来挖坟。

mean_cn: adj. 使人疲倦的;  烦人的, 讨厌的;  无聊的;
sentence: Office work is so tiresome that it makes me drowsy!
sentence_tra: 办公室工作真是无聊得让我昏昏欲睡！

mean_cn: n.碾磨机，制造厂v.碾，磨，（毫无目的地）乱转
sentence: The wind mill works by using wind power.
sentence_tra: 风车磨坊是利用风能工作的。

mean_cn: v. 扔，抛，掷n.掷，掷钱币来决定，猛抬头
sentence: This coin toss will decide who goes first.
sentence_tra: 掷硬币来决定谁先走。

mean_cn: v. 眩目；使惊叹
sentence: The sun's bright glare dazzles my eyes.
sentence_tra: 太阳刺眼的光芒让我眼花。

mean_cn: adj.使人感动的，非常好的；轰动性的；引起哗然的
sentence: The pop band put on a sensational show.
sentence_tra: 那个流行乐队的演出非常感人。

mean_cn: v.逗…笑，使娱乐
sentence: At work, she amuses herself by playing around.
sentence_tra: 工作时，她会瞎折腾着找乐子！

mean_cn: n.陆地，土地；国土，国家　　v.(使)登陆；(使)着陆
sentence: Who owns all of this land?
sentence_tra: 谁是这块儿地的主人？

mean_cn: vi. 下降, 下来;  突然访问;  降临;  vt. 下移, 下降;  走下;
sentence: The elevator descends slowly to the ground floor.
sentence_tra: 电梯缓缓地向一楼下降。

mean_cn: vt. 使厌烦
sentence: I am bored in Singapore.
sentence_tra: 我在新加坡很无聊。

mean_cn: adj. 敌对的，敌方的；怀敌意的n. 敌对
sentence: Why are you so hostile? I don't want to fight!
sentence_tra: 你为什么这么有敌意？我并不想打架。

mean_cn: n. 矛杆;  柄, 杆;  vt. 给…装杆;
sentence: A croquet mallet has a thin shaft and a heavy head.
sentence_tra: 长柄木槌包含一个细的柄和一个沉重的木槌。

mean_cn: n. 激情
sentence: The couple has a lot of passion in their relationship.
sentence_tra: 这一对情侣在恋爱中很有激情。

mean_cn: v.更新
sentence: Using this face mask helps me renew my youthful beauty.
sentence_tra: 使用这个面膜可以帮助我重塑我的年轻美貌。

mean_cn: v.麻烦，打扰；花时间n.烦扰，麻烦，打扰
sentence: The pain in my shoulder bothers me.
sentence_tra: 肩膀痛困扰着我。

mean_cn: adj.赤裸的；极少的
sentence: Her legs were bare.
sentence_tra: 她双腿赤裸。

mean_cn: n. 报答;  奖品;  补偿;  vt. 酬谢;  报答; 报应;
sentence: My reward for winning the race was a big trophy.
sentence_tra: 我赢得比赛的奖品是一个大奖杯。

mean_cn: n.小屋(简陋的)；船舱，机舱v.住在小屋里
sentence: We like to go to our small log cabin in the woods.
sentence_tra: 我们喜欢去我们在树林的小木屋。

mean_cn: adj.私人的，秘密的，私立的
sentence: As a CEO, I use a private jet to travel.
sentence_tra: 作为总裁，我乘私人飞机去旅行。

mean_cn: adj. 合法的，合理的
sentence: His passport is legitimate; It is not fake.
sentence_tra: 他的护照是合法的，不是假的。

mean_cn: n.推荐；赞扬；奖品
sentence: Her work was so good, everyone thought she deserved a commendation.
sentence_tra: 她的工作如此的好，每个人都认为她值得嘉奖。

mean_cn: n.拖，拖累物v.拉，拽；拖着（沉重的步伐或疲惫的身躯）
sentence: She dragged her husband into the bedroom after the marriage ceremony.
sentence_tra: 在婚礼典礼之后她拉着她的丈夫进了卧室。

mean_cn: v.赔偿，补偿
sentence: He is trying to compensate for being rude by buying me flowers.
sentence_tra: 他为我买了花，努力为自己的无理做着补偿。

mean_cn: n. 矿业；采矿
sentence: A long tunnel was made through mining to establish a new railway track.

mean_cn: 理解，想明白
sentence: Let me figure out what I can make for dinner... OK, got it!
sentence_tra: 让我想想我能做什么当晚餐。啊，想到了！

mean_cn: n.命运，运气；财产
sentence: Fortune, not skill, will decide if I win the money.
sentence_tra: 我能否赢钱靠的是运气而不是技术。

mean_cn: n.生活，生计；谋生方式
sentence: We all have different ways of earning our livelihood.
sentence_tra: 我们每个人有不同的方法维持生计。

mean_cn: n.出版，印刷，出版物
sentence: The magazine is finished and ready for publication.
sentence_tra: 杂志已经完成了，正等待出版。

mean_cn: adv.通常，正常地
sentence: She normally arrives at 10AM, today she was late.
sentence_tra: 她通常上午十点到达，但今天她迟到了。

mean_cn: n.代表，代理人adj.(of)典型的，有代表性的
sentence: The sales representative sold me a car.
sentence_tra: 这个销售代表卖给我一辆车。

mean_cn: n. (官职、获奖资格等的)候选人;  投考人;  攻读学位者;  申请求职者;
sentence: Both candidates told us why we should vote for them.
sentence_tra: 两个候选人都告诉我们，为何我们应该选他。

mean_cn: n.意图，意向，目的
sentence: My intention is to quit smoking in the next year.
sentence_tra: 我的目标是明年戒掉烟。

mean_cn: v.认出，鉴定，识别
sentence: Your fingerprints are unique, so they can help identify you to police.
sentence_tra: 你的指纹是独一无二的，所以它们可以帮助警察识别出你。

mean_cn: n. 职业; 同行; 声明; 立誓信教;
sentence: I don't just want a job, I want a real profession!
sentence_tra: 我不仅仅是想要一份工作，我想要一份真正的职业！

mean_cn: v.想要，打算，企图
sentence: Hi, cat, what do you intend to do - eat me, or just watch me?
sentence_tra: 嗨，小猫，你想干吗？吃掉我还是只是看着我。

mean_cn: n. 面貌, 相貌;  特征, 特点;  特辑;  vi. 起重要作用, 作为主要角色;  vt. 使突出, 以…为特色;
sentence: Wow, this cell phone has so many cool features!
sentence_tra: 哇，这部手机有好多超酷的特色（功能）！

mean_cn: v. 描绘，画出...的轮廓n. 外形，轮廓；大纲，概要
sentence: This outline of my invention should give you some idea of what I want.
sentence_tra: 这张关于我的发明的外形图应该会让你知道我想要什么。

mean_cn: n. 预期;  adj. 未来的;  预期的;
sentence: The prospective King is trying on his father's outfit.
sentence_tra: 这个未来的国王在试他父亲的衣服。

mean_cn: n.展出者，展览会参加者
sentence: I'm an exhibitor at the trade show. You should come by and see my exhibit.
sentence_tra: 我是一名贸易参展商。你应该来看我的展览。

mean_cn: adj.可利用的；可得到的
sentence: The house is available for rent.
sentence_tra: 此屋出租。

mean_cn: n. 柱;  邮政, 邮寄;  职位, 岗位;  哨所;vt. 贴出;  公告;  邮寄;
sentence: Every day, our business posts about twenty letters.
sentence_tra: 每天我们公司邮寄大约二十封信。

mean_cn: n.入口处；登记；进入

sentence_tra: 门卡是进这间房子所必须的。

mean_cn: n. 机构；创立；制度；习俗
sentence: The United Nations is a global institution devoted to preserving world peace.
sentence_tra: 联合国是致力于维护世界和平的国际性机构。

mean_cn: v.解释，理解为；口译
sentence: The doctors interpret the x-ray scans to see if I'm sick.
sentence_tra: 医生解读着X光片，好知道我是不是生病了。

mean_cn: n.运用；申请；应用程序
sentence: I use many applications on my cell phone and PC.
sentence_tra: 我在手机和电脑上使用很多应用程序。

mean_cn: n. 雇主, 老板;
sentence: My employer yells at me everyday.
sentence_tra: 我的老板每天都冲我嚷嚷。

mean_cn: adj.以前的；早先的，过早的
sentence: Press this button to go back to the previous page.
sentence_tra: 按这个按钮，回到上一页。

mean_cn: adj.秘书的；书记的；部长的
sentence: I'm good at typing, answering phones, and other secretarial tasks.
sentence_tra: 我擅长打字、接电话和其他的秘书工作。

mean_cn: n. 研究班；专题讨论会
sentence: Those who attended the seminar learnt a lot.
sentence_tra: 参加研讨会的人学到了很多东西。

mean_cn: n. 空;  空缺;  空虚;  悠闲;
sentence: There's a job vacancy - let me apply!
sentence_tra: 这儿有个职位空缺―我要申请！

mean_cn: v.驾驶，驱动n.驾车；驱动力；干劲
sentence: It is a long drive from Los Angeles to New York City.
sentence_tra: 从洛杉矶到纽约要开很久的车。

mean_cn: n.合同，契约v.订合同，收缩，缩减
sentence: We signed the contract and I bought the house.
sentence_tra: 我们签了合同后，我就买下了这栋房子。

mean_cn: v.压扁；压制n.南瓜；易压烂的物品；拥挤的人群；壁球
sentence: A can takes up much less space after you squash it.
sentence_tra: 踩扁罐头后它就会少占很多空间。

mean_cn: n. 强烈欲望, 雄心, 抱负;  (具体的)追求目标;  (干)劲;
sentence: His ambition was to get to the top.
sentence_tra: 他的雄心是到达顶部。

mean_cn: adj.各自的，各个的
sentence: Each European country has its own respective flag.
sentence_tra: 欧盟的每个国家都有各自的旗帜。

mean_cn: vi. 通过(渡过；被人了解)
sentence: The kids got across the river using the bridge.
sentence_tra: 孩子们从桥上过了河。

mean_cn: n. 学问;  奖学金;
sentence: Mom, I just won a $50,000 scholarship to help pay for college!
sentence_tra: 妈妈，我得到了五万美元奖学金用来交学费！

mean_cn: v.谈判，交涉，商议
sentence: We haven't made the deal yet, since we're still negotiating.
sentence_tra: 我们还未达成协议，因为我们仍在谈判。

mean_cn: n.章程，内容简介；样张；创办计划书
sentence: Please read this prospectus to see if you want to invest in our company.
sentence_tra: 请阅读本计划书，看是否愿意投资我们公司。

mean_cn: n.专门知识，专门技能
sentence: The doctor has expertise in medicine.
sentence_tra: 医生有很多医学方面的专业知识。

mean_cn: n. 姿势，位置，职位v. 安置
sentence: He says he thinks better in that position, but I'm not so sure he does.
sentence_tra: 他说他保持那种姿势时能更好地思考，但是我不认为他能。

mean_cn: n.不适，不安；不便之处v.使……不舒服；使……不安
sentence: My headache is causing me severe discomfort.
sentence_tra: 我的头痛引起了我的严重不适。

mean_cn: n. 电子制表软件；电子数据表；试算表
sentence: I'm checking the monthly profit spreadsheet for our business.
sentence_tra: 我正在检查我们生意的月度利润报表。

mean_cn: n.标准，规格adj. 标准的
sentence: The metric system is the standard system of measurement in most countries.
sentence_tra: 公制度量系统是大多数国家使用的标准测量系统。

mean_cn: n. 介绍；演讲；报告；颁发；提交，出示
sentence: In her presentation, she discussed what we can do to increase sales.
sentence_tra: 在她的报告中，她讨论了我们应该如何促进销售。

mean_cn: n. 备忘录
sentence: I put memos everywhere to remind me of things that I must do.
sentence_tra: 我把备忘录放得到处都是，以提醒自己必须做的事。

mean_cn: n. .田野；运动场；领域
sentence: The children liked to play in the field.
sentence_tra: 孩子们喜欢在田地里玩儿。

mean_cn: adj.先进的，高级的
sentence: This science seems to be too advanced for him!
sentence_tra: 看起来科学对他来说太难（高级）了。

mean_cn: v.补偿，弥补
sentence: The man tried to make up for his mistakes by giving her flowers.
sentence_tra: 那个男人尝试送她花以弥补他的错误。

mean_cn: adj.公司的，全体的，共同的，（法人）团体的
sentence: In a corporate job, you always have to think about profit.
sentence_tra: 在公司工作，你时刻都得考虑到利益。

mean_cn: adj.狂热的，极感兴趣的，热情的
sentence: He's always so enthusiastic about video games--he loves them so much.
sentence_tra: 他对电子游戏总是充满热情，他非常喜欢游戏！
